name: Iced Coffee
Instruction: Brew a strong cup of coffee and let it cool to room temperature.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cooled coffee over the ice.
Optionally, add milk, cream, or sweetener to taste.
Serve immediately.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
Instruction: Combine the coffee grounds and cold water in a jar or pitcher.
Stir to mix and let steep in the refrigerator for 12-24 hours.
Strain the coffee through a coffee filter or fine mesh strainer.
Serve over ice and dilute with water or milk if desired.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Americano
Instruction: Brew a double shot of espresso.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the espresso over the ice.
Add cold water to taste.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Latte
Instruction: Brew a single shot of espresso.
Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour the espresso over the ice.
Add cold milk and stir.
Serve immediately.

name: Iced Mocha

name: Iced Cappuccino
Instruction: Brew a single shot of espresso.

name: Frappuccino
Instruction: Blend the coffee, ice, milk, and flavored syrup until smooth.
Pour into a glass.
Top with whipped cream if desired.
Serve immediately.

name: Affogato
Instruction: Brew a single shot of espresso.
Place one scoop of vanilla ice cream in a serving glass.
Pour the hot espresso shot over the ice cream.
Serve immediately.
